title: Are the 100+ bugs on Mordekaiser ever going to be addressed?
body:
Are these ever going to be addressed or is Riot just going to sweep him under the rug like so many other champions?

If you aren't aware of the issue:

https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-reports-eu/fLvuqJ3d-all-180-mordekaiser-bugs-ranked-by-importance-and-sorted-into-17-categories

I use to main Mordekaiser, but he is in a very bad state right now, mostly do to bugs.

replies.body:
I'm a Morde main and you barely see any of the bugs when actually playing him, they're really mostly a meme at this point. There are a few annoying ones that happen somewhat regularly, like your Q dealing 0 damage, a couple bugs with his W healing, and tons of bugs with the drag AI that make him hard to control.

Yes, Mordekaiser is bad right now. He's somewhat playable in the bot lane(ew) but, the real problem is that he needs to be remade from scratch and given a modern champ kit as a top/mid laner. Right now he's kind of a mess of ideas that doesn't really fit in current LoL.

Out of curiosity, have you bothered to test even a handful of this list?  I don't mind the attention being drawn to my favorite champion but it's more than a little disappointing that an up to date list can't be made for proper referance.

I have tested the first 20 bugs on here and they still seem to be bugs:

https://www.reddit.com/r/MordekaiserMains/comments/538bcc/status_of_mordekaisers_bugs/

Obviously, there is a lot more to test, but it is evident that Mordekaiser is a buggy champion. Also, someone on the Reddit post commented saying that they were a Mordekaiser main in Master elo and that 70% or more of the bugs are still affecting him. I know this was about a year ago, but I have yet to see any patches that have addressed these bugs.

This was created 8 months ago and its lists over 200 Mordekaiser bugs:

https://www.dbltap.com/posts/5626900-updated-mordekaiser-buglist-reports-over-200-bugs

Thank you for the other listings.  I must reiterate, however, my disappointment that we do not have an up to date list with appropriate evidence that can be worked with.  Something from about a month or so ago would be best, with less references to features that are no longer a part of the game.
